Land to love, room to renovate & a leafy location to reward!
Land the location of your dreams in this in-demand address with a northerly aspect to the rear and a leafy low traffic outlook out front!
This expansive approx 697sqm property comes with a spotless 3 bedroom home and scope to renovate, redevelop, or rebuild a family dream home!

Offering as much appeal to families as it will to developers, this gracious Federation home dishes up a rare and exciting chance to procure an historic slice of Glen Huntly. Just metres to the village & station, the commanding brick residence is nestled on approx. 733sqm and boasts GRZ1 zoning. Providing extremely satisfying accommodation for now, it delivers a wealth of options for the future.
Graced with many original turn-of-the-20th-century characteristics such as high ceilings, ornate fireplaces, intricate fretwork and elegant lead light, the home features three large bedrooms, two separate living areas, bright eat-in kitchen, laundry and two bathrooms.
Split system heating/cooling is also offered along with garage and ample off-street parking.
An exceptional opportunity to dive into a sympathetic renovation and/or extension, this potential-loaded property is perfectly located for families. Its proximity to the station, bus stops, shopping destinations, schools and Monash University will also attract the interest of developers seeking that ideal high-density development site (STCA).

Apartment Lifestyle Living Perfected

So close to the Centre Road action, with fabulous cafes, shops, wine bars, train, buses, lovely parks, catholic schools and the library, zoned for Bentleigh West Primary School and Brighton Secondary College.
